column1: A little boy named @entity0 did not like to brush his teeth. One day, as his mother asked him to brush his teeth, @entity0 said, "I do not want to! It's gross and a waste of time!" In response, @entity0's mom told him that in order for him to grow up and be big and strong like she is, he must brush his teeth. In disgust, with his mom watching to make sure he brushed his teeth right, he brushed his teeth and whined until he was finished. The next day, @entity0 did not brush his teeth and told his mom that he did. After going to school, one of @entity0's friends said that his breath stunk and began to make fun of him. This made @entity0 very angry, so he pushed the boy over and started to cry. A teacher came over and called the principal as both kids were being loud and starting a fight. @entity0's mom came to school and took him home. After asking what was wrong, @entity0 told his mom that he did not brush his teeth. After hearing this, his mom marched him up to the bathroom and forced him to brush his teeth. "You will not get teased if you brush your teeth, @entity0!" she yelled, and then left the room. From that day forward, @entity0 brushed his teeth every day so the other kids would not make fun of him.
@placeholder did @entity0 do after his mom yelled at him
he brushed his teeth every day after that.
he did not go back to school.
he only brushed his teeth sometimes.
he brushed his teeth every day after that.
